title: Clumsy Pirates v2.3
description:
Arrrr! Help Billy The Mop in this simple but addictive pirate based puzzle game.
The pirates had been busy looting merchant ships and were celebrating a great day with plenty of Rum. 

All of a sudden a merry pirate accidentally lights one of the cannon bombs. Not knowing what to do with it, he hands it to the youngest pirate, Billy The Mop a.k.a the mopping boy. Billy has to hurry with the bomb and throw it overboard to save the ship.

Throw the bomb overboard before it explodes and save his ship while collecting gold coins. But, watch out! This is not an easy task as the path to the upper deck is full of obstacles that will slow you down.

FEATURES

* 96 challenging levels spread across 6 worlds
* Simple touch-based controls make 
* Intuitive and fun for players of all skill levels
* Delightful graphics and sounds bring the worlds and characters to life
* Excellent soundtrack sets the scene for this puzzle-adventure

What's New:

- Gameplay optimisations.
